title: 80th Annual Columbus Day Parade
description: A parade celebrating Columbus Day, taking place along Fifth Ave from 47th Street to 72nd Street.
address: Fifth Ave from 47th Street to 72nd Street

title: BQ Flea Market
description: A flea market held under the BQE along Meeker Ave between Union Ave and Lorimer St, featuring various vendors and goods.
address: Under the BQE along Meeker Ave between Union Ave and Lorimer St, Williamsburg/Greenpoint

title: NYC Makers Bazaar at Grand Bazaar NYC
description: An indoor and outdoor market featuring local makers and artisans, taking place at Grand Bazaar NYC.
address: 100 W 77th St at Columbus Ave, UWS

title: Spooky Makers Market
description: A market featuring spooky-themed goods and activities, held at Footlight Underground at the Windjammer.
address: Footlight Underground at the Windjammer, Ridgewood

title: Brooklyn Hearts Club’s Sinister Sinner’s Market
description: A market featuring local vendors and spooky-themed goods, held at Crystal Lake Brooklyn.

title: Yes Halloween Market
description: A Halloween-themed market featuring local vendors and activities, held at House of Yes.

title: Clothing Swap
description: A clothing swap event where attendees can exchange clothes, held at Otto’s Shrunken Head Bar.
address: Otto’s Shrunken Head Bar, East Village

title: 10th Annual Indigenous Peoples Day
description: A celebration of Indigenous Peoples Day with various activities, held at Randall’s Island.

title: How to Win an Election: Make Sense of Polls
description: A presentation and discussion about understanding polls, hosted by Andrea Jones-Rooy, Ph.D., with expert guests.
address: Caveat Theatre, 21A Clinton St. NY, NY 10002

title: Kings County Fiber Festival
description: A festival featuring fiber arts, taking place at Washington Park and the Old Stone House in Park Slope, Brooklyn.
address: Washington Park and the Old Stone House, Park Slope, Brooklyn

title: The Cruise with Bennett Miller
description: A remastered screening of the film 'The Cruise' with a Q&A session following the screening, featuring Bennett Miller.

title: New York Shorts International Film Festival 2024
description: An international film festival showcasing short films, held at Cinema Village.

title: Free Outdoor Movie: Beetlejuice
description: A free outdoor screening of the movie 'Beetlejuice', weather permitting, at Pier 57.

title: Drunk Planet Earth
description: A participatory show combining nature documentaries and drinking games, held at Easy Lover.

title: Vocabaret: ‘Conspiracy’ Edition
description: A monthly variety show for language lovers, featuring five wordsmiths presenting entertainment inspired by a theme, held at Caveat.

title: Dreamland Roller Disco
description: Themed skate parties at Prospect Park's Lefrak Center, continuing for the fall season.

title: Boyz in the Woods Comedy
description: A standup-meets-trivia show featuring various comedians, held at Friends and Lovers.

title: Bitches Brew Comedy Show
description: A women-produced and hosted comedy show featuring various comedians, held at Halyards.

title: Drop Up Video
description: A panel of comedians roasting music videos, held at Pine Box Rock Shop.
